崻字的基本解释

崻
zhì
古同“峙”。

崻
shì
古同“峙”。

崻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》直里切，上止，澄。］
亦作“崻1”。
(1)耸立。
(2)谓相对耸立。
(3)站立；树立。
(4)水中土丘。
(5)通“庤”。储备。
(6)通“恃”。凭藉，依赖。
[②]［shì］
亦作“崻2”。
地名用字。山西省有繁峙县。

崻字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崻； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页315第34
【集韻】丈里切，音雉。山獨立貌。　【正字通】俗峙字。

崻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
崻字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words

Gu Tong "sticks".
Wei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" cut straight, top stop, clear. ]
Also known as "崻1".
(1) Towering.
(2) It is said to be relatively towering.
(3) Standing; erecting.
(4) Soil mounds in the water.
(5) Link "庤". reserve.
(6) Through "reliance". Rely on, rely on.
[②]［shì］
Also known as "崻2".
Place names in words. There is Fanzhi County in Shanxi Province.
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　崻; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 315 and 34
[Jiyun] Zhang Liqie, sound pheasant. Mountain independent appearance.　【Zhengzitong】vulgar Zhizi.
